title: 10/04/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 10/04/21 DPS Best Of
description:
In this Best Of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan explains why Brady/Belichick was not his biggest take away from Sunday's game. Also, Peter King of NBCSports.com calls in to discuss why the Steelers are in trouble. Finally, Carson Palmer makes his weekly pit-stop to talk Arizona Cardinals football and the possibility that they're the best team in the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
